column3: Latest;Phnom Penh – Police intervened in a case at around 9 pm on January 16
column4: 2020 at a guesthouse along National Road 6A in Sangkat Prek Leap
column5: Chroy Chang Va district.------Before the incident
column6: a Chinese man was seen forcing a Cambodian woman into a white TOYOTA CAMRY 2007
column7: from a guesthouse located on National Road 6A in the Prek Leap neighborhood.------Shortly afterwards
column8: the Chroy Changvar district police chased down thee vehicle on the riverbank
column9: and found the woman in the trunk.------She was immediately taken to Calmette Hospital. Authorities took the suspect to Chroy Chang Va district police headquarters for questioning and legal action.------AREY NEWS
